price: Ẹ tẹ̀lé ti Allāhu, ẹ tẹ̀lé ti Òjíṣẹ́. Kí ẹ sì ṣọ́ra. Nítorí náà, tí ẹ bá gbúnrí, kí ẹ mọ̀ pé ìkéde (ẹ̀sìn) tó yanjú ni ojúṣe Òjíṣẹ́ Wa.
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَٱحۡذَرُواْۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla wa-iḥ'dharū fa-in tawallaytum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
